DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect different degree renal impairment pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics dabigatran etexilate administer orally .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics , Safety Tolerability Dabigatran Etexilate Patients With Without Renal Impairment
